about_the_game:
The Fancy Pants Adventures: Classic Pack is a collection of the original Fancy Pants games - the renowned series that set the bar for Flash games, and defined a generation of platformers - being rebuilt and remastered by creator Brad Borne.

These games have been in semi-active development for nearly 2 decades. So why keep that process private now? Join Brad on this journey, publicly patching up decades old Flash games, and beefing this Pack up to be the ultimate Fancy Pants fan experience!


This collection aims to preserve the legacy of The Fancy Pants Adventures as you remember them, compiled for your convenience, with new quality of life features for a modern context.

Fancy Features

  • Controller support - Use the same keyboard you did 15 years ago, or plug in and play with controller support!
  • Silky smooth gameplay - A smooth, reliable experience, untethered from browser limitations. This means widescreen support, increased framerates and many optimizations

Upcoming Features

  • More Worlds - World 1 Remix + Remaster, World 2 Remaster, Fancy Snowboarding, and whatever else we can think of!
  • The Back Pages - Brand NEW levels, handcrafted to expand and connect these Fancy Worlds
  • Treasure Trove - Concept art, animations, early prototypes, demos, and more for the ultimate Fancy Pants fans!
  • Steam Achievements - Prove you're the best by collecting every secret, and completing every challenge
  • Localization - Work has begun to localize these titles! That implementation will likely come after some fundamentals have been added and refined.
detailed_description:
IN DEVELOPMENT

Currently available in Early Access

  • "Classic" World 1 & World 2, updated with high-res widescreen support, and 60fps
  • WIP "Classic" World 3, fully playable, but only at 30fps with some polish still needed


About the Game

The Fancy Pants Adventures: Classic Pack is a collection of the original Fancy Pants games - the renowned series that set the bar for Flash games, and defined a generation of platformers - being rebuilt and remastered by creator Brad Borne.

These games have been in semi-active development for nearly 2 decades. So why keep that process private now? Join Brad on this journey, publicly patching up decades old Flash games, and beefing this Pack up to be the ultimate Fancy Pants fan experience!


This collection aims to preserve the legacy of The Fancy Pants Adventures as you remember them, compiled for your convenience, with new quality of life features for a modern context.

Fancy Features

  • Controller support - Use the same keyboard you did 15 years ago, or plug in and play with controller support!
  • Silky smooth gameplay - A smooth, reliable experience, untethered from browser limitations. This means widescreen support, increased framerates and many optimizations

Upcoming Features

  • More Worlds - World 1 Remix + Remaster, World 2 Remaster, Fancy Snowboarding, and whatever else we can think of!
  • The Back Pages - Brand NEW levels, handcrafted to expand and connect these Fancy Worlds
  • Treasure Trove - Concept art, animations, early prototypes, demos, and more for the ultimate Fancy Pants fans!
  • Steam Achievements - Prove you're the best by collecting every secret, and completing every challenge
  • Localization - Work has begun to localize these titles! That implementation will likely come after some fundamentals have been added and refined.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OSX v10.9 or above
  • Processor: Intel Core I3 2.5 GHz
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

name: The Fancy Pants Adventures: Classic Pack

package_groups.name: default
package_groups.title: Buy The Fancy Pants Adventures: Classic Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7, Windows 8.1, Windows 10 64 Bit
  • Processor: 2.5GHz
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

reviews:
“The Fancy Pants Adventure series brings to the table some of the best platforming action you can have. So, put on the fanciest pants you own and experience Brad Borne's charming adventure series.”
4.6/5 – jayisgames

“Fancy Pants Adventure was a big day for Flash gaming, in my opinion, having introduced a fresh, original platformer with tons of quality and charm. Brad Borne reminded people how cool Flash games could be.”
4.7/5 – Tom Fulp

“Sleek animations, tight physics, an utter absence of sophomoric shock humor; a rare, complete victory for fuzzy childhood nostalgia.”
PC Gamer
short_description: The classic Flash game series, compiled as the ultimate Fancy Pants fan collection - with updated visuals, loads of bonus features, and brand new Back Pages bonus levels. Follow along in Early Access, as creator Brad Borne brings these games back to their former glory. Run Fast, Run Fancy!
